name: has_succession_plan_in_place
question: Do you have a succession plan in place?

surveyjs.name: has_succession_plan_in_place
surveyjs.title: Do you have a succession plan in place?
surveyjs.description: Succession planning is about future proofing your business. Whether you are seeking to remove yourself from the day-to-day running of the business, considering selling at some point in the future, or just planning long term for your retirement, succession planning is critical to your continuity of your business.

description: Succession planning is about future proofing your business. Whether you are seeking to remove yourself from the day-to-day running of the business, considering selling at some point in the future, or just planning long term for your retirement, succession planning is critical to your continuity of your business.

name: util_production_equip
question: What is the utilisation of your current production equipment? Meaning of 'Utilisation' in this instance:  The amount of time that equipment are being used for productive work. 100% is full capacity, fully utilised. 50% for example refers to equipment being used half the available time allocated to productive work, and in theory then have more capacity to produce.

surveyjs.name: util_production_equip
surveyjs.title: What is the utilisation of your current production equipment? Meaning of 'Utilisation' in this instance:  The amount of time that equipment are being used for productive work. 100% is full capacity, fully utilised. 50% for example refers to equipment being used half the available time allocated to productive work, and in theory then have more capacity to produce.

name: util_manufacturing_facility
question: What is the utilisation of your current manufacturing facility? Meaning of 'Utilisation' in this instance:  The amount of space that is being used in your manufacturing facility for productive work. 100% is full capacity, fully utilised. 50% for example refers to only half the space being used for productive work, and in theory  there is more space to expand into.

surveyjs.name: util_manufacturing_facility
surveyjs.title: What is the utilisation of your current manufacturing facility? Meaning of 'Utilisation' in this instance:  The amount of space that is being used in your manufacturing facility for productive work. 100% is full capacity, fully utilised. 50% for example refers to only half the space being used for productive work, and in theory  there is more space to expand into.

name: util_manufacturing_team
question: What is the utilisation of your current manufacturing team? Meaning of 'Utilisation' in this instance:  The amount of time that the team's available hours are being used for productive work. 100% is full capacity, fully utilised. 50% for example refers to the team being used half the available time allocated to productive work and in theory they have more capacity to produce.

surveyjs.name: util_manufacturing_team
surveyjs.title: What is the utilisation of your current manufacturing team? surveyjs.title: Do your physical premises, be it office, warehouse etc require any updating in terms of external appeal (such as new paint or logo refreshment etc.)?
surveyjs.description: The reality is the people do 'judge the book by its cover',meaning that if your office or retail premise for example looks outdated, perhaps your logo is peeling off the sign or is faded, then those in themselves will affect the perception people will have of your business.

surveyjs.description: Qualify them using these as the guide: Size (Bigger, Smaller, Same). Prices (More Expensive, Less Expensive, Same). Quality (Better, Worse, Same). Strengths (e.g. part of buying group, good sales team, great reputation, very active marketing, well established etc). Weaknesses (e.g. poor reputation, poor range, no sales team, fail to adapt to market etc).
